text: Omega: They are here...
Proton: It seems there is another Xuirist camp here, butwe must proceed.
Break: Omega's been defeated, I've got to get out of here!
(Break flees!)
Omega: They're gone... they're all gone...
Omega: ...
Omega: I've been defeated. You win, Proton.
(Omega kneels before Proton)
Omega: Kill me however you wish.
Proton: ...
Proton: An honorable death for a Xuirist, you will be executed.
(Proton executes Omega)
Proton: ...
Scien: We'll be reaching the Village of Binding soon,it will be the final chance for us to prepare beforeentering the Shadow Realm.
[Village of Binding, Nation of Nation]
Proton: We've arrived.
Proton: ...
???: You there! Are you what I think you are!?
Proton: Huh?
???: You must be here to stop the Shadow Realm, are you?
Proton: Yes, actually.
???: Great!
???: I am Fiyghtrr, and I have been training years for this moment!
Fiyghtrr: Allow me to join you on your attack on the Shadow Realm!
[Recruit Fiyghtrr?](Q) Recruit(W) Do not recruit
Fiyghtrr: ...what?
???: YOU THERE!!!
Proton: (Why does this keep happening to me...)
???: Your army looks like it's lacking members.
???: Might you need a...
???: Might you need a... REPLACEMENT UNIT?
???: Of course you do! Everyone needs a replacement unit!
???: And you are in luck!
???: You see, I am Recalper: THE ULTIMATE REPLACEMENT UNIT!!!
Recalper: That's right! Got a void in your army after one of yourcomrades died in the field?
Recalper: That void will instantly be sealed up by my greatness!
Recalper: No one replaces the deceased like I do!
Recalper: So, what do you think? Want to recruit me into yourpainfully empty army?
[Recruit Recalper?](Q) Recruit(W) Do not recruit
Recalper: What!? Don't you know that you can't replacethe replacement!?
Proton: It's time to enter the Shadow Realm...
Proton: We'll activate the portal at the Location of Binding andenter from there.
